Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Piercing, The Cloaker attaches itself to the target, attempting to blind and suffocate the creature
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Cloaker makes 2 attacks, one with its bite and one with its tail
Other Actions.Action 2: Moan, Each creature that can hear the Cloaker's Moan must make a Wisdom Saving Throw or be frightned by the Cloaker
Other Actions.Action 3: Phantasms, The Cloaker magically creates three illusions of itself to confuse attackers

Abilities.Ability 1: Damage Transfer, While attached to a creature, the Cloaker takes half the damage dealt to it, and that creature takes the other half
Abilities.Ability 2: False Appearance, While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak
Abilities.Ability 3: Light Sensitivity, While in bright light, the Cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight
